extendedInfo.description: Using your finger as a sword, slice and dice objects into pieces like a mad viking! Rise through the ranks to be the ultimate Claymore swinging Viking! This game may contain Historical inaccuracies. ** How To Play ** - Slice each Object a certain amount of times using your finger as a sword! - The faster the better score! ** Features ** * Sword Slashing Action! * GameCenter Integrated! * High Scoring! * Quick Pick up and Play! * Casual, yet addictive!
